titles.title: Permitting payments to be made by the House of Representatives to reimburse Members, officers, and employees for qualified adoption expenses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Oversight.

bill.summary: 10/10/1998--Introduced. Permits payment from applicable accounts of the House of Representatives of up to $2,000 to reimburse any Member, officer, or employee of the House for qualified adoption expenses related to the adoption of an eligible child, if authorized by the appropriate employing authority.
